methods.description: Geolocate user's location information via IP address

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: IP address (IPv4 or IPv6) for reverse IP location lookup purposes. If not present, the server IP address will be used for the location lookup.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Translation information. The translation only applicable for continent, country, region and city name. This parameter is only available for Plus and Security plan only.

apiDescription: IP2Location.io IP Geolocation API provides RESTful API to obtain visitorsâ€™ geolocation information such as country, region, district, city, latitude & longitude, ZIP code, time zone, ASN, ISP, domain, net speed, IDD code, area code, weather station data, MNC, MCC, mobile brand, elevation, usage type, address type, advertisement category, ASN and proxy data with an IP address.
